+page.svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import type { Snapshot } from './$types';
	
	let comment = '';
	
	export const snapshot: Snapshot<string> = {
		capture: () => comment,
		restore: (value) => (comment = value),
	};
</script>

<form method="POST">
	<label for="comment">Comment</label>
	<textarea id="comment" bind:value={comment} />
	<button>Post comment</button>
</form>
